org.grandviewtech.entity.bo.Routine.name: OR WORD WITH BOTH DATA VARIABLE
org.grandviewtech.entity.bo.Routine.functionalBlock:
MOV DPTR,#D2008L MOV A,@DPTR MOV TEMP,A MOV DPTR,#D2009L MOVX A,@DPTR ORL A,TEMP
MOV DPTR,#D2010L MOVX @DPTR,A
MOV DPTR,#D2008H MOVX A,@DPTR MOV TEMP11,A MOV DPTR,#D2009H MOVX A,@DPTR ORL A,TEMP11 MOV DPTR,#D2010H MOVX @DPTR,A
